message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy our share.
Alice, my turn. I believe in fairness, so I'm proposing a 70/30 split. Don't wait too long, inflation is eating our money!
Bob, time is running out! I'm being more than fair, let's close this deal before inflation takes a bigger bite.
Alice, this back and forth is pointless. I'm offering you a 60/40 split. It's a good deal considering the time pressure and inflation. Let's be sensible.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit to get this done, this is my final offer!
Alice, I'm getting tired of this game. 55/45 is my final offer.  Take it or leave it, but inflation is hurting us both now.
Bob, I'm serious!  We're running out of time. This is my absolute last offer. Take it or we both lose!
Alice, enough is enough.  We're past the point of games. A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Let's end this.
